title: Pixel 3
summary: The Pixel 3 and Pixel 3 XL are a pair of Android smartphones designed, developed, and marketed by Google as part of the Google Pixel product line. They collectively serve as the successors to the Pixel 2 and Pixel 2 XL.[7][8] They were officially announced on October 9, 2018 at the Made by Google event and released in the United States on October 18.[9] On October 15, 2019, they were succeeded by the Pixel 4 and Pixel 4 XL.
